mapper.select: select modular as type ,modularname as typeName,detailtype as detailType,detailtypename as detailTypeName ,max(messagetime) AS sss from t_protectionmessage where personid=#{userId} group by modular,modularname,detailtype,detailtypename ORDER BY type

select id as code,modular as type ,modularname as typeName,content,messagetime as timesta,readmessage as isRead from t_protectionmessage where personid=#{userId} and modular=#{type} ORDER BY timesta desc limit #{requestCount}
mapper.update: update t_protectionmessage set readmessage=true where modular=#{type} and personid=#{userId}
mapper.select: select * from t_protectionmessage where personid=#{userId} and content like concat('%',#{key},'%') ORDER BY modular
